:loading.description: Whether to display the skeleton placeholder, set to false will display the content of the sub-component
:loading.description_zh: 是否显示骨架占位图，设置为false将会展示子组件内容

animate.description: Whether to turn on animation effects

rows.description: The number of rows in the paragraph placeholder

rowsWidth.description: The width of the paragraph placeholder, which can be a percentage, a numeric value, a string with units, etc., can be passed in an array to specify the width of each paragraph line
rowsWidth.description_zh: 段落占位图的宽度，可以为百分比，数值，带单位字符串等，可通过数组传入指定每个段落行的宽度

title.description: Whether to display the title placeholder

avatar.description: Whether to display the avatar placeholder

avatarShape.description: The shape of the avatar placeholder, circle-circle, square-square
avatarShape.description_zh: 头像占位图的形状，circle-圆形，square-方形
